name: se-project
description: The **Online Event Ticketing System** is a full-stack web application designed to streamline the process of browsing, booking, and managing tickets for events. The system supports three user roles: **Standard User**, **Event Organizer**, and **System Admin**, each with distinct functionalities. Users can browse events, book tickets, and view their booking history, while organizers can manage events. The system admin has full control over users and events.
